answers.answer: Hello dear and welcome to the medhelp forum. Ejaculatory failure could be due to pelvic nerve damage which could have resulted due to some abdominal pelvic surgery, spine injury, diabetes mellitus. Since your history suggests an inability to ejaculate though you can sustain an erection, you need to consult a physician for assessment and investigation.  Wishing you all the best.

question: i can get hard, but i have no feeling towards the top of my penis and i can not come is this ok
title: neurolgy
